body.name: Cudy Unlocked Outdoor 4G LTE Cat 4 Modem Router with SIM Card Slot, AC1200 WiFi, EC25, IP65, Detachable Antennas, Passive PoE Adapter Included, Pole or Wall mounting, DDNS, VPN, LT500 Outdoor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 1 min
features: Works with Major 4G providers. Insert a BYOD(Bring your own device) SIM card from mobile carrier to get download speeds up to 150Mbps. Simply insert a SIM card and get all your Wi-Fi devices connected to the internet, very convenient for places where cable internet is unavailable, such as your holiday cabins or remote cameras.
Convert 4G LTE Cat.4 signal to fast AC1200 dual band Wi-Fi and fast ethernet, share Internet to all your wired and WiFi devices to enjoy uninterrupted streaming, HD video gaming, and web conferencing

SMA interface and detachable 4G Cellular antennas. 2 x 5dBi cellular antennas enhance the sensitivity of the router and improve the signal quality of 4G LTE. At the same time, the cellular antenna is a detachable design. If you want to use other high gain outdoor cellular antenna, the SMA connector also provides the possibility of an external cellular antenna.

IP65 rated waterproof housing and 4KV lightning protection design, suitable for outdoor use. Pole or wall mount for easy installation in your yard, shop, farm or RV. 24V passive PoE power supply (power adapter included) support tranmit power and ethernet via single ethernet cable, which is convenient for any installation scenario.

Easy and Security. Simply insert the SIM card in the router to start exploiting a stable and fast wireless. Provides an easy-to-use graphical management interface, easy to monitor and manage the network. Support DNS Encryption with Cloudflare or NextDNS or google, protect your privacy, prevents eavesdropping and manipulation of DNS data via man-in-the-middle attacks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Turn Everywhere 4G into Speedy AC1200 Wi-Fi With 4G Cat. 4 standards, LT500 Outdoor communicates with a 4G tower with speeds of up to 150 Mbps download and 50 Mbps upload. With MU-MIMO and dual-band features, the AC1200 Wi-Fi shares the fast 4G with over 30 devices while minimizing the latency. Boosted Wi-Fi Coverage with Beamforming Tested Wi-Fi coverage performance in four different scenarios, achieved by Beamforming technology and two built-in antennas. If your space is too large for one Cudy 4G Outdoor Router to cover, you can expand your Wi-Fi coverage into a Mesh network by adding another Cudy AP.

Works in Rain, Thunder, Dust, Heat, Cold The 4G router is protected by an IP65 standard case, shielding it from rain and dust when installed vertically. It also features 4 kV Lightning/Surge and 8 kV ESD protection for higher reliability in thunderstorms. Its working temperatures span from -40 °F to 149 °F (-40 °C to 65 °C).

Outdoor Full-Bar 4G Signal Brings High-Quality Wi-Fi Insert a SIM, Enjoy Wi-Fi Install Wi-Fi anywhere is as easy as plugging a SIM card and booting it up with the PoE adapter. One PoE Adapter is included in the box. Pull Network to 100 m Away Plug your Ethernet cable into the PoE adapter/switch to get up to 100 m of wired network reach. The extra cable is not included in the box. Install an AP for Indoor Wi-Fi Connect an AP to the PoE adapter to equip your cafe, home, or office with a better Wi-Fi signal. AP needs to be purchased separately. Install Extension Antennas The default 4G antennas are as sensitive as a standard phone's antennas. You can still replace them with customized ones via the SMA connectors.

A Quick Guide to Network Installation A Reliable Network Solution Gigabit Solution (Gigabit speed only in Intranet, suitable for NAS users): Switch: Cudy GS108 (Skip this if you don't require extra wired connections)AP: Cudy WR1300E/WR1300/WR3000 (Choose AP mode during setup) Budget Solution: AP: Cudy WR1200 (Choose AP mode during Setup) Mounting Kit Included A mounting kit is included in the box, supporting– Wall-MountingPole-Mounting

Specifications 4G UE Catagory 4G Cat. 4 with Max 150 Mbps Download and Max 50 Mbps Upload Cellular Module EC25-AFX Working Bands LTE-FDD: B2/4/5/12/13/14/66/71; WCDMA: B2/4/5 Wi-Fi Speeds AC1200; Up to 867 Mbps on 5 GHz, Up to 300 Mbps on 2.4 GHz Antennas 2× Detachable 4G Antennas, 2× Internal Wi-Fi Antennas Power 24 V Passive PoE (PoE Adapter Included) VPN Server and Client Zerotier, Wireguard, OpenVPN, IPSec, L2TP, PPTP DNS over TLS Cloudflare, Google, Quad9 Cellular Features Band Lock, TTL Settings, Cellular/WAN Failover Multi-Mode Router (4G/WAN), WISP (4G as Backup), AP, Wi-Fi Extender Mesh Compatibility Works with other Cudy Mesh products (as the main Mesh node) Pacakge Content Router, Antennas, 1m-long Ethernet Cable, PoE Adapter, Installation Guide Dust/Waterproof IP65 (Router only when installed vertically, the PoE adapter is not waterproof) Electricals 4 kV Lightning/Surge Protection, 4 kV Contact ESD Protection, 8 kV Air ESD Protection Temperatures Operating Temperature: -20 ℃ ~ 60 ℃ (-4 ℉ ~140 ℉) Extend Operating Temperature with Industrial Grade SIM Card: -40 ℃ ~ 65 ℃ (-40 ℉ ~ 149 ℉) Storage Temperature: -40 ℃ ~ 70 ℃ (-40 ℉ ~ 158 ℉) Operating Humidity: 0% ~ 100% non-condensing Storage Humidity: 5% ~ 90% non-condensing Dimensions Device Body: 240×100×53.7 mm (9.45×3.94×2.11''); Each Antenna: 197.5×21.6×15.5 mm (7.78×0.85×0.61''); Total: Height: 438 mm (17.24'')

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A stand up company
reviews.reviewText: EDITED: I purchased to replace the hotspot I had. As soon as I put my SIM in, Cricket suspended my account. They claim it is a 3G item, and isn't compatible with their system.Cudy reached out to me to offer a refund. I refused because I changed my cell company to Pure Talk, and now it works beautifully!To the gentleman that gave a 1 star review, the password is "password". It, and the IMEI are written on the inside of the cover. The directions weren't clear about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Having good signal in outdoors
reviews.reviewText: It's a little big device but worth it since now i can have full wifi from my cellphone carrier in places where the signal is low for average cellphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very useful for LTE backup/primary
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a durable outdoor LTE modem to use as a backup for my xFinity wired service and (maybe someday?) allow for a complete drop of Comcast. I've used numerous Cudy devices over the last few years and have had great luck with their quality/reliability. So far (~2 months?), this device is working great, although the only time I've bene able to test it is when I "forced" an xFinity outage by disconnecting my cable modem.The quality of the build is really good, and the installation (on a brick wall) went as smoothly as expected (although you'll likely need to supply your own fasteners for certain installation surfaces).Because I'm using this device as an LTE-to-Ethernet bridge, I went into the Cudy software and disabled the built-in Wi-Fi. To that point, I have not tested the Wi-Fi capabilities of this device.A couple of points that I wish were different:- I don't know what the lifespan of LTE will be, but it would have been nice if this device supported 5G so that it was more future-proof and supportive of faster data speeds. 3G eventually went away and I'm presuming that LTE will as well someday?- It would be nice if this device supported active PoE+. It comes with a 24V passive PoE injector, but that means I needed to add that in-line between my network station (PoE+ switch) and this device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's been working great
reviews.reviewText: The range is disappointing, so I had to add a wifi router so the signal could reach my cameras. But it does work in the really cold so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Better than last version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price great product
reviews.reviewText: OK i set this unit up outside, hardwired to my house WiFi and it worked. I have a strong signal inside and outside the house. This actually worked and extended my signal to where i can WiFi all over my house and outside at the pool with no issues. We will see how long it can hold up to the elements and see if the speed can stay constant over time. So far great product with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very quick setup, PnP out of the box
reviews.reviewText: I decided on this item because of the ability to plug a SIM card into the modem and have wifi without having to buy internet service from one of the expensive providers or as a back-up if my normal internet disconnects which happens a lot with the provider I have. I also travel a lot and I thought this would be a great solution or alternative to buying wifi at a hotel which can run around $25/day for higher end hotels. The set-up was very easy, just plug the ethernet cable into the adapter and router which doubles as the power source. Supply your own ethernet cable to your computer to configure the password. You have the option to insert a SIM card or run the second ethernet cable to your modem and use as a router. I tested the speed of this router against my netgear and orbi routers and it was about at 50% what the others tested with uploads and downloads of around 90mbps. The reason for 4 stars is because the SIM cards have been transitioning to eSIM across cell phone providers and I can see this item become antiquated in the next 5 years unless they allow for an eSIM option. Also, it is a CAT 4 and that could have some problems as the industry has transitioned to CAT 6 and higher. You will also need good cell service for the SIM to be recognized which may be a problem in very remote locations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cellular to WiFi access point for internet while camping!
reviews.reviewText: If you camp a lot like I do, you know that the WiFi provided by the majority of campgrounds is usually slow and pretty much unusable for streaming TV services in most cases. Well, that issue is now solved with this unit! It was simple to insert a SIM card from my cellular provider and get up and running in no time. The signal strength for both the cellular and WiFi are both excellent, and the speed is more than adequate for my family's needs. What more can I say? This product is the perfect solution for our campground internet blues, so it earns my recommendation and five star blessing!
Ottimo prodotto, subito messo in funzione senza problemi

reviews.reviewTitle: Router para exteriores con capacidad 4G y amplia cobertura de la señal de emisión WIFI
reviews.reviewText: El poder disponer de un servicio de internet inalámbrico en zonas exteriores o en una pequeña parcela de campo que tengamos, suele ser complicado si utilizamos los routers clásicos que nos ofrecen las operadoras o similares. En esos casos es MUY RECOMENDABLE la instalación de uno preparado para emitir la señal en exteriores, con bajos consumos eléctricos y posibilidad de crear y ofrecer una red WIFI de calidad y rápida a partir de una tarjeta SIM de telefonía móvil. Permitiendo una total independencia de redes físicas de cable o similares y pudiendo ofrecer total libertad de instalación.. El router se presenta con formato compacto y preparado para su instalación sobre barras de metal o sobre pared/techo con los sistemas de anclaje incluidos. Pudiendo a posteriori orientar las antenas incluidas en la dirección deseada.. Los sistemas de conexión de las antenas incluidas son conectores SMA estandarizados, por lo que podemos conectar las antenas personalizadas que queramos o que ya tengamos previamente en nuestra zona de instalación. Permitiendo ampliar el alcance y cobertura del sistema con una inversión previa que podamos tener.. El router está preparado para funcionar bajo la banda de 4G de cualquier operador de nuestro país, rangos des temperaturas extremas tanto por debajo de cero como de rayos directos del sol. Y soportar cualquier inclemencia del tiempo de viento, polvo y agua directa. Con el extra incorporado de un sistema de protección especial contra rayos para funcionar en tormentas eléctricas con total seguridad.. Es compatible con los sistemas PoE de alimentación directa por el cable de red, aunque debido a sus consumos, es obligatorio el uso del adaptador a red incluido. Los sistemas PoE permiten control y encendido directo a distancia sin necesidad de sistemas adicionales, además de poder controlar dispositivos compatibles como cámaras o enrutadores de red a distancia. MUY UTIL. Se ha incluido un puerto de red compatible, para la conexión por cable de dispositivos sin capacidad inalámbrica directa, además del posible uso de puntos acceso adicionales al sistema y la ampliación de la cobertura de toda la red a partir del router 4G. Permitiendo con una baja inversión, controlar sistemas a largas distancias en fincas o terrenos alejados.. Es compatible con las dos bandas WIFI más habituales de 2.4 Ghz y 5 Ghz, permitiendo hasta conexiones de más de 30 dispositivos diferentes y los anchos de banda habituales de estas bandas. Aunque siempre tendremos que tener en cuenta el ancho de banda que nos ofrece la red 4G a la que estemos conectados por distancia y estado a las antenas asignadas.De todas formas, el poder compartir y controlar toda una red independiente y totalmente automatizada a partir de una conexión 4G de alta velocidad, nos permite una libertad y comodidad de disponer de conexiones WIFI en casi cualquier punto del país, Incluso en zonas rurales mas alejadas y de difícil acceso a las redes por cable habituales.. El dispositivo es compatible con la mayoría de sistemas de VPN del mercado y permite la configuración directa del DNS con cualquier, pudiendo acceder a internet por cualquiera de los cauces habituales y disponer de una seguridad PLENA y CONFIABLE en la transmisión de información sensible a través de ella. IDEAL para sistemas de alarma, transmisión de datos personales o zonas de trabajo con control maquinaria sensible. Las posibilidades son infinitas y la calidad de la red y velocidad creada por el router MUY BUENA y ESTABLE en casi cualquier situación de interferencias o agentes externos.En lo que respecta a mi uso del dispositivo, he podido crear una red con una multisim de mi línea de teléfono, compartiendo datos de la misma y disponiendo de internet en una casa de campo sin conexión digital y a cierta distancia de un núcleo urbano. Puedo controlar un sistema de alarma y cámaras de la casa a distancia, con un consumo de datos bajo y controlado por IA para detección de intrusos.MUY UTIL y MUY RECOMENDADO en lugares sin acceso a línea de internet o si queremos reducir gastos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dieser Outdoor-Router ist perfekt, in 5 Minuten installiert und funktioniert einwandfrei
reviews.reviewText: ...zu Beginn ist zu sagen, dass es sich hier um die Bewertung eines kostenlos zur Verfügung gestellten Produktes handelt (siehe Anmerkung am Ende).↔️ Vergleich mit einem ähnlichen Produkt: Wir haben bisher ein Mesh-Netzwerk mit Geräten von der Telekom, mit dem ich hier vergleiche.📦 Verpackung: Sehr professionell, in hochwertigem Karton sicher verpackt.💰 Preis: Zum Zeitpunkt meiner Bestellung 99,90 €, was unserer Meinung nach ein "faires" und in diesem Bereich übliches Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist.🛠 Verarbeitung: Hervorragend, sehr ordentlich und sauber verarbeitet, das verwendete Material entspricht zu 100 % der für mich üblichen und sehr guten Qualität vergleichbarer Produkte.📐Größe: Relativ klein und unauffällig, entspricht von den Abmessungen her genau der Beschreibung und ist daher genau wie ich es erwartet habe. Perfekt für die Außenmontage an unserem Balkon von der Ferienwohnung.⚙️ Technik: Es ist eigentlich eine eigenständige WLan-Basis mit je einem 2,4 und einem 5 GHz Kanal. Das Teil kann auch über Kabel mit weiteren Geräten verbunden werden, was bei uns erst später gemacht wird. Das Netzteil ist PoE und damit perfekt für die Außenmontage (Netzteil dann in der Steckdose in der Wohnung) und unseren Einsatzzweck geeignet. Die Installation war spielend, leicht und in wenigen Minuten erledigt. Das WLan-Signal ist super stabil, sehr stark und damit perfekt.👀 Optik: Entspricht exakt den Abbildungen, meiner Meinung super modern, sehr hochwertig und professionell.💡 Verwendung: Wir verwenden dieses Gerät in unserer Ferienwohnung auf dem Balkon, da wir im Innenbereich deutlich schlechteren Netzempfang haben und das Internet mit diesem Außengerät deutlich schneller ist. Wir sind sehr zufrieden.Zusätzlich gefällt mir:✅ das super schlichte Design und die kompakte Baugröße.✅ und natürlich, dass es für den Außenbereich ist und damit ungehinderten Empfang bietet.Nicht gefallen hat mir:❌ das dieses Teil optimal für die Montage an einem Mast ausgelegt ist, für die einfach Wandmontage sind nur zwei Löcher zum Aufhängen, was nicht ganz so stabil wirkt, ist aber ok.📝 Ich kann hier aber problemlos alle 5 Sterne geben und ich würde dieses Teil jederzeit wieder bestellen.Sollte sich etwas Neues ergeben, werde ich darüber berichten.Anmerkung:Jedes Produkt wird absolut subjektiv beurteilt (kostenlos oder nicht). Die hier abgegebene Bewertung entspricht meiner persönlichen Erfahrung und Meinung zum jeweiligen Produkt. Vorhandene Beschreibungen und Bewertungen werden (so weit es möglich ist) nicht wiederholt und ich lade auch keine zusätzlichen Fotos hoch, wenn bereits aussagekräftige Fotos hochgeladen wurden, oder das Hochladen von Fotos für mich keinen Sinn macht. Wenn Fotos gewünscht werden, kann ich diese auf Nachfrage gerne senden.

Wir nutzen Internet zu Hause via LTE; eine starke Antenne auf dem Balkon sorgt für Empfang, eine Fritz leitet weiter. Nun griff ich hierbei zu, um das Setting zu verbessern.Der Empfang ist gut, wir erhalten das von uns bestellte Maximum an LTE. Auch der Wlan-Empfang ist problemlos. Das Setup war einfach, die Wandmontage ebenfalls. Entsprechend ausgerichtet gab es keine Probleme, das LTE-Internet herzustellen. Die Verarbeitung von dem Gerät ist gut, es ist unauffällig und erledigt seinen Job. Auch ist es robust genug, um im Freien angebracht zu werden, wobei es natürlich geschützt auf dem Balkon montiert haben, nicht Regen und Schnee ausgesetzt.Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis empfinden wir als gut, der aufgerufene Preis von derzeit knapp 100 Euro ist für dieses Gerät durchaus angemessen.Wir haben unsere Situation was den LTE-Empfang anbelangt durchaus verbessern können und sind sehr zufrieden – 5 von 5 Sterne.

De momento sólo lo he *configurado, emparejado con 3 cámaras de vigilancia y probado en interior, tengo que instalar en exterior y es aquí dónde tengo que comprobar cobertura y sobre todo resistencia a la intemperie, agua, calor, frío, condensaciónes, heladas, etc.*La configuración y con unos conocimientos tecnológicos & informáticos dígamos básicos es fácil, seguir las indicaciones y poco más
